Room.Name: Castle in the Clouds
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a giant cloud so high in the sky that you couldn't see it from the ground. There is a giant castle built on top of the cloud.
Room.LongDescription: The castle is huge to the average person. The doorway into the castle must be nearly fifty yards high. If that's any indication of the size of the people living in this castle, you're not so sure it was such a good idea to come here.
